se.cbb.jprime.prm

Class FixedAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.prm.FixedAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<FixedAttribute>

    public class FixedAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FixedAttribute>
    Represents a fixed attribute of a PRM class, analogous to a column in a relational database table. These hold invariant data, typically corresponding to primary or foreign keys.

    The attribute is tied to a PRM class, and also holds all attribute entities (column values) in an indexed list which must be aligned with all other attributes of the PRM class. The attribute automatically adds itself to its PRM class.

    Moreover, if the values are unique, the attribute may be "indexed" so that one may do a quick lookup of a record's integer index from its string value.

    Two instances of this class are considered "comparable" if they share the same full name. This situation should occur seldom in practice.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
